resource.chars:
59 Harley Str 
February 20th 1858
My dear Sir 
I have read over Professor 
C. Smyth’s geological observations from 
p 1 to 24 of the MS you sent me.
Nearly the whole of them he has 
already printed in his recently pub-
lished volume on Teneriffe, which I 
have compared with this M.S.
For the benefit of any one of the 
Council who may assist in editing 
these papers I beg to refer to the 
following pp of Prof. Smyth’s Teneriffe 
(London - Lovell Reeve - 1858)
pp. 54 - 63 & 70 - 72 - 94 - 150 -
155 - 156 - 167 - 226 - 227 - 229 - 235 -
236 - 237 - 243 - 249 - 262 - 263 - 265 -
266 - 304 - 305 - 311 - 314 - 368 - 384
